005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.IDataTypeAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint.Level;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationFinding.Kind;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.validation.IValidationResult;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
020import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
021
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024import java.util.regex.Pattern;
025
026import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
027
028/**
029 * A validation result handler that collects the resulting findings for later
030 * retrieval using the {@link #getFindings()} method.
031 * <p>
032 * This class is not thread safe.
033 */
034@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
035public class FindingCollectingConstraintValidationHandler
036    extends AbstractConstraintValidationHandler
037    implements IValidationResult {
038  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FindingCollectingConstraintValidationHandler.class);
039  @NonNull
040  private final List<ConstraintValidationFinding> findings = new LinkedList<>();
041  @NonNull
042  private Level highestLevel = IConstraint.Level.INFORMATIONAL;
043
044  @Override
045  @NonNull
046  public List<ConstraintValidationFinding> getFindings() {
047    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(findings);
048  }
049
050  @Override
051  @NonNull
052  public Level getHighestSeverity() {
053    return highestLevel;
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Add a finding to the collection of findings maintained by this instance.
058   *
059   * @param finding
060   *          the finding to add
061   */
062  protected void addFinding(@NonNull ConstraintValidationFinding finding) {
063    findings.add(finding);
064
065    Level severity = finding.getSeverity();
066    if (severity.ordinal() > highestLevel.ordinal()) {
067      highestLevel = severity;
068    }
069  }
070
071  @NonNull
072  private static Kind toKind(@NonNull Level level) {
073    Kind retval;
074    switch (level) {
075    case CRITICAL:
076    case ERROR:
077      retval = Kind.FAIL;
078      break;
079    case INFORMATIONAL:
080    case DEBUG:
081    case NONE:
082      retval = Kind.INFORMATIONAL;
083      break;
084    case WARNING:
085      retval = Kind.PASS;
086      break;
087    default:
088      throw new UnsupportedOperationException(String.format("Unsupported level '%s'.", level));
089    }
090
091    return retval;
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  public void handleCardinalityMinimumViolation(
096      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
097      @NonNull INodeItem target,
098      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> testedItems,
099      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
100    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, target)
101        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
102        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
103        .target(target)
104        .subjects(testedItems.getValue())
105        .message(newCardinalityMinimumViolationMessage(constraint, target, testedItems, dynamicContext))
106        .build());
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public void handleCardinalityMaximumViolation(
111      @NonNull ICardinalityConstraint constraint,
112      @NonNull INodeItem target,
113      @NonNull ISequence<? extends INodeItem> testedItems,
114      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
115    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, target)
116        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
117        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
118        .target(target)
119        .subjects(testedItems.getValue())
120        .message(newCardinalityMaximumViolationMessage(constraint, target, testedItems, dynamicContext))
121        .build());
122  }
123
124  @Override
125  public void handleIndexDuplicateKeyViolation(
126      @NonNull IIndexConstraint constraint,
127      @NonNull INodeItem node,
128      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
129      @NonNull INodeItem target,
130      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
131    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
132        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
133        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
134        .target(target)
135        .message(newIndexDuplicateKeyViolationMessage(constraint, node, oldItem, target, dynamicContext))
136        .build());
137  }
138
139  @Override
140  public void handleUniqueKeyViolation(
141      @NonNull IUniqueConstraint constraint,
142      @NonNull INodeItem node,
143      @NonNull INodeItem oldItem,
144      @NonNull INodeItem target,
145      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
146    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
147        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
148        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
149        .target(target)
150        .message(newUniqueKeyViolationMessage(constraint, node, oldItem, target, dynamicContext))
151        .build());
152  }
153
154  @SuppressWarnings("null")
155  @Override
156  public void handleKeyMatchError(
157      @NonNull IKeyConstraint constraint,
158      @NonNull INodeItem node,
159      @NonNull INodeItem target,
160      @NonNull MetapathException cause,
161      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
162    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
163        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
164        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
165        .target(target)
166        .message(cause.getLocalizedMessage())
167        .cause(cause)
168        .build());
169  }
170
171  @Override
172  public void handleMatchPatternViolation(
173      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
174      @NonNull INodeItem node,
175      @NonNull INodeItem target,
176      @NonNull String value,
177      @NonNull Pattern pattern,
178      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
179    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
180        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
181        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
182        .target(target)
183        .message(newMatchPatternViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, value, pattern, dynamicContext))
184        .build());
185  }
186
187  @Override
188  public void handleMatchDatatypeViolation(
189      @NonNull IMatchesConstraint constraint,
190      @NonNull INodeItem node,
191      @NonNull INodeItem target,
192      @NonNull String value,
193      @NonNull IDataTypeAdapter<?> adapter,
194      @NonNull IllegalArgumentException cause,
195      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
196    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
197        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
198        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
199        .target(target)
200        .message(newMatchDatatypeViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, value, adapter, dynamicContext))
201        .cause(cause)
202        .build());
203  }
204
205  @Override
206  public void handleExpectViolation(
207      @NonNull IExpectConstraint constraint,
208      @NonNull INodeItem node,
209      @NonNull INodeItem target,
210      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
211    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
212        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
213        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
214        .target(target)
215        .message(newExpectViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, dynamicContext))
216        .build());
217  }
218
219  @Override
220  public void handleAllowedValuesViolation(
221      @NonNull List<IAllowedValuesConstraint> failedConstraints,
222      @NonNull INodeItem target,
223      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
224    Level maxLevel = ObjectUtils.notNull(failedConstraints.stream()
225        .map(IAllowedValuesConstraint::getLevel)
226        .reduce(Level.NONE, (l1, l2) -> l1.ordinal() >= l2.ordinal() ? l1 : l2));
227
228    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(failedConstraints, target)
229        .severity(maxLevel)
230        .kind(toKind(maxLevel))
231        .target(target)
232        .message(newAllowedValuesViolationMessage(failedConstraints, target))
233        .build());
234  }
235
236  @Override
237  public void handleIndexDuplicateViolation(
238      IIndexConstraint constraint,
239      INodeItem node,
240      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
241    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
242        .kind(Kind.FAIL)
243        .severity(Level.CRITICAL)
244        .target(node)
245        .message(newIndexDuplicateViolationMessage(constraint, node))
246        .build());
247  }
248
249  @Override
250  public void handleIndexMiss(
251      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
252      @NonNull INodeItem node,
253      @NonNull INodeItem target,
254      @NonNull List<String> key,
255      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
256    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
257        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
258        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
259        .target(target)
260        .message(newIndexMissMessage(constraint, node, target, key, dynamicContext))
261        .build());
262  }
263
264  @Override
265  public void handleMissingIndexViolation(
266      @NonNull IIndexHasKeyConstraint constraint,
267      @NonNull INodeItem node,
268      @NonNull INodeItem target,
269      @NonNull String message,
270      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
271    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
272        .severity(constraint.getLevel())
273        .kind(toKind(constraint.getLevel()))
274        .target(target)
275        .message(newMissingIndexViolationMessage(constraint, node, target, message, dynamicContext))
276        .build());
277  }
278
279  @Override
280  public void handlePass(
281      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
282      @NonNull INodeItem node,
283      @NonNull INodeItem target,
284      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
285    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
286        .kind(Kind.PASS)
287        .severity(Level.NONE)
288        .target(target)
289        .build());
290  }
291
292  @Override
293  public void handleError(
294      @NonNull IConstraint constraint,
295      @NonNull INodeItem node,
296      @NonNull String message,
297      @NonNull Throwable exception,
298      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext) {
299    LOGGER.atError().withThrowable(exception).log(message);
300    addFinding(ConstraintValidationFinding.builder(constraint, node)
301        .kind(Kind.FAIL)
302        .severity(Level.CRITICAL)
303        .target(node)
304        .message(message)
305        .cause(exception)
306        .build());
307  }
308}
